name: The Slaughterday
description:
You are a celestial soldier guarding the North Heavenly Gate, but one day you were transformed by mortal technology into a semi-magical semi-mechanical bionic transformation warrior, trapped in a time-space loop called "slaughter day", caught in infinite resurrection and battle. You have been trained by the disciples of the True Martial Demon Heavenly Sect, you have extremely high combat ability, and your consciousness is sealed in the space-time cycle of the Slasher Level and the Death Battle Level, these levels are very dangerous. You have to defeat the enemies according to the rules of it. And the infinite cycle. Sometimes, your consciousness will enter another trapped person in the death battle level, her name is Purple Rakshas, who is trapped in the "slaughter day" space-time cycle just like you. You need to fight and survive in this situation forever, and at present, there seems to be no way out for you.

This game is a third person melee combat game. In the game, you will use your moves, skills, and fierce and flexible attacks to defeat your enemies.

The game is divided into BOSS fight levels and death fight levels. When you start the game, you will enter the BOSS fight level. After killing the BOSS in the BOSS fight level, you will enter the death fight level. When you are killed in the death fight level, you will return to the BOSS fight and cycle in this way. You will score continuously in this cycle, and your final highest score will be displayed on the main menu.

BOSS fight level has two combat modes: assassination and bloody battle. In assassination mode, the enemy will not find you at first. You can press the right mouse button to assassinate the enemy after approaching the enemy, but it must be on the premise that the enemy does not find you, so remember to approach the enemy from behind. In the bloody battle mode, you will get the help of dummy teammates wearing masks and iron armor (the word "队友" will be marked on the top of the teammates). At the same time, you need to fight among numerous and infinitely refreshing enemies. In both modes, you must kill the boss to win.

BOSS fight level:

The ultimate goal of the level is to defeat the boss.

Press WASD to moves. the left mouse button attacks. Press Q to dash (with invincible frames), and rolls the mouse wheel to switch the attack mode. After switching, you will change a set of attack animation, and you can choose the one with the best feeling. When you get a skill weapon, you can press F to call it. Skill weapons will be activated in the death fight level. Ammunition of the skill weapon will be exhausted after one use, but they will refresh every 25 seconds. After refreshing, press F again to switch skill weapons.

Death battle level:

After completing the tasks in the BOSS fight level, you will enter the deadly battle level, which will randomly select one of the three tasks of parkour, the explosive berserker and the mad boomer for you.

Parkour: the AD key controls the movement direction of the characters, press E to dash. Press space to jump and avoid obstacles on the road. When you encounter enemies on the road, press the left mouse button to kill them.

explosive berserker: you will have an explosion stick with unlimited ammunition. When you hit the ground with it, you can kill the enemy, but it will also eject yourself backwards. You need to prevent yourself from being killed or ejected from the platform on the premise of killing the enemy as much as possible.

mad boomer: your main weapon has become a boom on your back. Press the E key to place it on the map and it will explode in three seconds. Use your move to ensure that the enemy chasing you is right next to the explosive barrel after three seconds, so that the enemy can be killed by explosion. At the same time, keep away from the boom. The boom will also cause damage to you. Of course, you will also have a small dagger as a secondary weapon, but it is useless and the damage is extremely low. So make good use of your explosive barrel.

skills:

Rejuvenation: faster blood recover.

Explosion stick: you can press the F key to switch out the Berserker barrel of the skill weapon. After pressing the attack key, you can hit the ground and cause explosion to blow up the enemy. However, after one use, the ammunition is exhausted. It will be activated every 25 seconds in the beheading level.

Hammer of the vacuum: press f to switch the skill weapon. After hitting the ground hard, it kills the enemies with the vacuum it creates.

Dash kill: it exists in parkour mode and can kill enemies when dashing.
